name: Hyper Pong Mobile
description:
Play Pong

Play multiplayer

Play in your phone

Play because this game is meant to be played

Play because play

Play respects

Play again

Play again and again

Play like there's no tomorrow

Play like if in fact there was no tomorrow

Play like if there was no tomorrow and no other game to play than Pong

Play this Pong

Play now

Play like this words would have convinced you

Play that game if you've read so far

Play Pong
